name: CrazyKingdom
description:
You, the bark of a small kingdom inhabited by Angels, Demons and Birds. They turn to you to solve their problems. Remember that while indulging the whims of others, do not forget about yourself. Be a worthy ruler!

Make or break laws.
The seal is taken and placed on the left mouse button.
Put the print in place with the right mouse button
After printing, press the left mouse button again for the next law.

Read the text of the law carefully before you accept it and follow the figures of the fractions at the top of the screen. Good luck!
